title: Vaultwarden
release-notes:
* Updated to the latest upstream code with notable changes:
  - Fixed syncing and login issues with native mobile clients
* Full change log available [here](https://github.com/dani-garcia/vaultwarden/releases/tag/1.32.1)

description.long: Vaultwarden is a lightweight and secure password manager for storing and auto-filling sensitive information such as usernames and passwords, credit cards, identities, and notes. It is an alternative implementation of the Bitwarden server API written in Rust and compatible with upstream Bitwarden clients. All data is stored in an encrypted vault on your server.

alive.name: Web UI
alive.success-message: Ready to visit in a web browser

main.name: Web Interface/Bitwarden Protocol
main.description: Main user interface for interacting with Vaultwarden in a web browser. Also serves the bitwarden protocol.
